含义: The character '共' primarily means 'together', 'common', or 'shared'. It conveys the idea of joint participation or collective involvement.
字形: '共' is composed of two parts: the upper part '八' (eight) and the lower part '冋' (return). The structure symbolizes a gathering or coming together.
读音: The pronunciation of '共' is 'gòng' in Mandarin.
字源: The character '共' originated from ancient Chinese pictographs, representing the concept of sharing or commonality. It evolved from a depiction of hands joining together.
成语: 同舟共济 (tóng zhōu gòng jì) - to pull together in times of trouble
患难与共 (huàn nàn yǔ gòng) - to share hardships
共襄盛举 (gòng xiāng shèng jǔ) - to join in a grand event
例句: 我们共同完成了这个项目。 (We completed this project together.)
他们共享了所有的资源。 (They shared all the resources.)
短故事: 在古代，有两个村庄因为一条河流而经常发生争执。后来，他们决定共同管理这条河流，从此和平共处。 (In ancient times, two villages often quarreled over a river. Later, they decided to manage the river together and lived in peace thereafter.)
一个团队共同克服了重重困难，最终取得了成功。 (A team overcame numerous difficulties together and eventually achieved success.)
诗词: 《静夜思》 - 李白: '床前明月光，疑是地上霜。举头望明月，低头思故乡。' (Though '共' is not in this poem, it reflects the shared human experience of longing for home.)
《登鹳雀楼》 - 王之涣: '白日依山尽，黄河入海流。欲穷千里目，更上一层楼。' (This poem also reflects a shared experience of striving for higher perspectives.)
